text: The 2019 Bethune–Cookman Wildcats football team represented Bethune–Cookman University in the 2019 NCAA Division I FCS football season. They were led by fifth-year head coach Terry Sims and played their home games at Daytona Stadium. They were a member of the Mid-Eastern Athletic Conference (MEAC). They finished the season 7–4, 5–3 in MEAC play to finish in fourth place. ==Previous season== The Wildcats finished the 2018 season 7–5, 5–2 in MEAC play to finish in a tie for second place. ==Preseason== ===MEAC poll=== In the MEAC preseason poll released on July 26, 2019, the Wildcats were predicted to finish in second place. {| class="wikitable" |- align="center" |- align="center" | 1 || North Carolina A&T; || 304 (12) |- align="center" | 2 || Bethune–Cookman || 237 (1) |- align="center" | 3 || Florida A&M; || 204 (2) |- align="center" | 4 || Howard || 166 |- align="center" | 5 || North Carolina Central || 161 (1) |- align="center" | 6 || South Carolina State || 152 |- align="center" | 7 || Norfolk State || 119 (1) |- align="center" | 8 || Morgan State || 87 (1) |- align="center" | 9 || Delaware State || 46 |} ===Preseason All–MEAC teams=== The Wildcats had eleven players selected to the preseason all-MEAC teams. First Team Offense L'Dre Barnes – C Second Team Offense Cedric Jackson – OL Third Team Offense Akevious Williams – QB Nicholas Roos – OL Jamal Savage – OL First Team Defense Marques Ford – DL Marquis Hendrix – LB Trevor Merritt – DB Tydarius Peters – DB Jimmie Robinson – RS Third Team Defense Gerome Howard – DL ==Schedule== ==Game summaries== ===vs. Jackson State=== {| class="wikitable" |- align="center" |- align="center" | 2–4 | 1989 | L, 7–27 |} ===at Miami (FL)=== {| class="wikitable" |- align="center" |- align="center" | 0–4 | 2017 | L, 13–41 |} ===at Mississippi Valley State=== {| class="wikitable" |- align="center" |- align="center" | 4–1 | 2018 | W, 41–27 |} ===at Howard=== {| class="wikitable" |- align="center" |- align="center" | 18–15–1 | 2018 | L, 35–41 |} ===Morgan State=== {| class="wikitable" |- align="center" |- align="center" | 24–7 | 2018 | W, 30–28 |} ===at North Carolina Central=== {| class="wikitable" |- align="center" |- align="center" | 8–2 | 2018 | W, 28–25 |} ===Norfolk State=== {| class="wikitable" |- align="center" |- align="center" | 18–8 | 2016 | W, 21–14 |} ===South Carolina State=== {| class="wikitable" |- align="center" |- align="center" | 24–33–1 | 2018 | W, 28–26 |} ===at Delaware State=== {| class="wikitable" |- align="center" |- align="center" | 20–19 | 2016 | W, 41–10 |} ===at North Carolina A&T;=== {| class="wikitable" |- align="center" |- align="center" | 22–17 | 2018 | L, 10–35 |} ===vs. Florida A&M;=== {| class="wikitable" |- align="center" |- align="center" | 23–49–1 | 2018 | W, 33–19 |} ==References== Bethune-Cookman Category:Bethune–Cookman Wildcats football seasons Bethune- Cookman Football
